title: Luciana, Ciudad Real
summary: Luciana is a small village and municipality in the province of Ciudad Real (Spain), near the confluence of the Bullaque and Guadiana Rivers. This village is historically associated with Campo de Calatrava, in the province of Ciudad-Real and in the Autonomous Community of Castilla La Mancha. It extends up to the municipal term of Piedrabuena in the north, Abenojar in the south, Los Pozuelos in the east and up to Saceruela and Puebla de Don Rodrigo in the west.
content:
Luciana is a small village and municipality in the province of Ciudad Real (Spain), near the confluence of the Bullaque and Guadiana Rivers. This village is historically associated with Campo de Calatrava, in the province of Ciudad-Real and in the Autonomous Community of Castilla La Mancha. It extends up to the municipal term of Piedrabuena in the north, Abenojar in the south, Los Pozuelos in the east and up to Saceruela and Puebla de Don Rodrigo in the west.
